Message.Title: Question re: Watson effect Thoughts?
Message.Msg: Watson becomes own device, IBM smartphone or APP for all OS. My guess is APP. I'm thinking this could cause IBM to more than double within next 2-3 years. Serious discussion please?

I do not think Watson will be a serious player in the consumer space. Watson is too analytical. The consumer wants something more intuitive like Siri. Watson is very valuable to IBM. However, I see it being more valuable in the enterprise arena than the consumer. The consumer just wants quick answers without all of the data analysis. Watson as an application is more practical, and useful to the consumer.

Topic.Title: I want to see a split!
